functions.name: get controller
description: Retrieves the system information for an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: set IPv4
description: Sets the controller IPv4 address, netmask and gateway address.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: address
args.description: controller IPv4 address

args.name: netmask
args.description: controller IPv4 subnet mask

args.name: gateway
args.description: controller gateway IPv4 address

functions.name: get time
description: Retrieves the access controller system date and time.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: set time
description: Sets the access controller system date and time.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: date-time
args.description: date/time to which to set controller system time

functions.name: get listener
description: Retrieves the access controller event listener IPv4 address:port and auto-send interval.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: set listener
description: Sets the access controller event listener IPv4 address:port and auto-send interval.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: address
args.description: IPv4 address of host to receive controller events

args.name: port
args.description: UDP port of host for controller events

args.name: interval
args.description: status auto-send interval (seconds). A '0' interval disables auto-send.

functions.name: get door
description: Retrieves the control mode and unlock delay time for an access controller door.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: door
args.description: door ID ([1..4])

functions.name: set door
description: Sets the control mode and unlock delay time for an access controller door.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: door
args.description: door ID ([1..4])

args.name: mode
args.description: control mode (1:normally open, 2:normally closed. 3:controlled)

args.name: delay
args.description: unlock delay (seconds))

functions.name: open door
description: Unlocks a door controlled by an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: door
args.description: door ID ([1..4])

functions.name: get status
description: Retrieves the system status from an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

fields.name: relays
fields.description: bitset of door unlock relay states

fields.name: event direction
fields.description: last event door direction (1: in, 2: out)

functions.name: get cards
description: Retrieves the number of cards stored on an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: get card
description: Retrieves the card information for a given card number.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: card number
args.description: card number

functions.name: get card at index
description: Retrieves the card information stored at a given index.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: index
args.description: card record index

functions.name: put card
description: Creates or updates the card information stored on an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: card
args.description: card number

args.name: start date
args.description: date from which card is valid

args.name: end date
args.description: date after which card is invalid

args.name: door 1
args.description: access permissions for door 1 (0: no access, 1: 24/7 access, [2..253] time profile)

args.name: door 2
args.description: access permissions for door 2 (0: no access, 1: 24/7 access, [2..253] time profile)

args.name: door 3
args.description: access permissions for door 3 (0: no access, 1: 24/7 access, [2..253] time profile)

args.name: door 4
args.description: access permissions for door 4 (0: no access, 1: 24/7 access, [2..253] time profile)

args.name: PIN
args.description: optional PIN code [0..999999] (0 for none)

functions.name: delete card
description: Removes a card record stored on a controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: card number
args.description: card number

functions.name: delete all cards
description: Deletes all card records stored on an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: get event
description: Retrieves an event record stored on an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: event index
args.description: index of event to retrieve

fields.name: access granted
fields.description: true if the door was unlocked

fields.name: door
fields.description: door no. ([1..4]) for card and door events

fields.name: direction
fields.description: direction (1:IN, 2:OUT) for card and door events

functions.name: get event index
description: Retrieves the downloaded event index from an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: set event index
description: Sets the downloaded event index on an access controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: event index
args.description: downloaded event index

functions.name: record special events
description: Enables/disables events for door opened, door closed and door button pressed.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: enabled
args.description: enables door opened, door closed and button pressed events if true

functions.name: get time profile
description: Retrieves the requested access time profile from a controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: profile
args.description: profile ID ([2..254] to retrieve

fields.name: start date
fields.description: date from which profile is valid (inclusive)

fields.name: end date
fields.description: date after which profile is invalid

fields.name: monday
fields.description: profile enabled on Monday if true

fields.name: tuesday
fields.description: profile enabled on Tuesday if true

fields.name: wednesday
fields.description: profile enabled on Wednesday if true

fields.name: thursday
fields.description: profile enabled on Thursday if true

fields.name: friday
fields.description: profile enabled on Monday if true

fields.name: saturday
fields.description: profile enabled on Friday if true

fields.name: sunday
fields.description: profile enabled on Sunday if true

fields.name: segment 1 start
fields.description: start time for first time segment

fields.name: segment 1 end
fields.description: end time for first time segment

fields.name: segment 2 start
fields.description: start time for second time segment

fields.name: segment 2 end
fields.description: end time for second time segment

fields.name: segment 3 start
fields.description: start time for third time segment

fields.name: segment 3 end
fields.description: end time for third time segment

fields.name: linked profile
fields.description: ID of linked profile (0 if not linked)

functions.name: set time profile
description: Adds or updates an access time profile stored on a controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: profile
args.description: profile Id ([2..254] to create/update

args.name: start date
args.description: date from which profile is valid (inclusive)

args.name: end date
args.description: date after which profile is invalid

args.name: monday
args.description: profile valid on Monday if true

args.name: tuesday
args.description: profile valid on Tuesday if true

args.name: wednesday
args.description: profile valid on Wednesday if true

args.name: thursday
args.description: profile valid on Thursday if true

args.name: friday
args.description: profile valid on Friday if true

args.name: saturday
args.description: profile valid on Saturday if true

args.name: sunday
args.description: profile valid on Sunday if true

args.name: segment 1 start
args.description: start time for first time segment

args.name: segment 1 end
args.description: end time for first time segment

args.name: segment 2 start
args.description: start time for second time segment

args.name: segment 2 end
args.description: end time for second time segment

args.name: segment 3 start
args.description: start time for third time segment

args.name: segment 3 end
args.description: end time for third time segment

args.name: linked profile id
args.description: ID of linked profile (0 if not linked)

functions.name: clear time profiles
description: Clears all access time profiles stored on a controller.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: task
args.description: task type

args.name: start date
args.description: date from which task is scheduled (inclusive)

args.name: end date
args.description: date after which task no longer scheduled

args.name: monday
args.description: task enabled on Monday if true

args.name: tuesday
args.description: task enabled on Tuesday if true

args.name: wednesday
args.description: task enabled on Wednesday if true

args.name: thursday
args.description: task enabled on Thursday if true

args.name: friday
args.description: task enabled on Monday if true

args.name: saturday
args.description: task enabled on Friday if true

args.name: sunday
args.description: task enabled on Sunday if true

args.name: start time
args.description: time at which task is scheduled

args.name: door
args.description: door ([1..4] to which task is linked

args.name: more cards
args.description: number of 'more cards' for the MORE CARDS task type

functions.name: refresh task list
description: Updates scheduler with newly created scheduled tasks.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: set PC control
description: Enables remote access control. Remote access control will remain in effect provided the controller
receives a message from the host at least once every 30 seconds.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: enabled
args.description: enables/disables remote access control

functions.name: set interlock
description: Sets the door interlock mode on an access controller.
The following interlock modes are supported:

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: interlock
args.description: door interlock mode

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: reader 1
args.description: enables/disable the keypad for reader 1

args.name: reader 2
args.description: enables/disables the keypad for reader 2

args.name: reader 3
args.description: enables/disables the keypad for reader 3

args.name: reader 4
args.description: enables/disables the keypad for reader 4

functions.name: set door passcodes
description: Sets up to 4 passcodes for a controller door.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: door
args.description: door ID ([1..4])

args.name: passcode 1
args.description: supervisor passcode ([0..99999]), 0 for 'none'

args.name: passcode 2
args.description: supervisor passcode ([0..99999]), 0 for 'none'

args.name: passcode 3
args.description: supervisor passcode ([0..99999]), 0 for 'none'

args.name: passcode 4
args.description: supervisor passcode ([0..99999]), 0 for 'none'

functions.name: get anti-passback
description: Retrieves the anti-passback mode for an access controller. The anti-passback mode
will be one of the following:

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

functions.name: set anti-passback
description: Sets the access controller anti-passback mode.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

args.name: antipassback
args.description: anti-passback mode

functions.name: restore default parameters
description: Restores the controller configuration to the manufacturer defaults.

args.name: controller
args.description: uint32|Controller controller serial number or {id, address, protocol} Controller struct

fields.name: relays
fields.description: bitset of door unlock relay states

fields.name: event direction
fields.description: last event door direction (1: in, 2: out)

fields.name: access granted
fields.description: true if the door was unlocked

fields.name: door
fields.description: door no. ([1..4]) for card and door events

fields.name: direction
fields.description: direction (1:IN, 2:OUT) for card and door events

fields.name: start date
fields.description: date from which profile is valid (inclusive)

fields.name: end date
fields.description: date after which profile is invalid

fields.name: monday
fields.description: profile enabled on Monday if true

fields.name: tuesday
fields.description: profile enabled on Tuesday if true

fields.name: wednesday
fields.description: profile enabled on Wednesday if true

fields.name: thursday
fields.description: profile enabled on Thursday if true

fields.name: friday
fields.description: profile enabled on Monday if true

fields.name: saturday
fields.description: profile enabled on Friday if true

fields.name: sunday
fields.description: profile enabled on Sunday if true

fields.name: segment 1 start
fields.description: start time for first time segment

fields.name: segment 1 end
fields.description: end time for first time segment

fields.name: segment 2 start
fields.description: start time for second time segment

fields.name: segment 2 end
fields.description: end time for second time segment

fields.name: segment 3 start
fields.description: start time for third time segment

fields.name: segment 3 end
fields.description: end time for third time segment

fields.name: linked profile
fields.description: ID of linked profile (0 if not linked)
